name: INSECT HAZARD
description: Action game in which a girl's school is attacked by insects. This is a story using selected dot animation and 2D illustrations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Windows10 Processor: CPU : Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU E8600 @ 3.33GHz Memory: 4095 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 2 GB available space
